properties.description:
Copies files from source server(s) for the following Linked Services Part 3
LS_AZ_KHC_EXTERNALSHARE_STRGV2
LS_FS_APAC_CHINA
LS_SFTP_NORTHSTAR
LS_SFTP_BLACKSMITH
LS_S3_SIGNAL
LS_SFTP_SAP_CATALYST_AL11
LS_AZ_KHC_O9_EXTERNALSHARE_STRGV2
LS_SFTP_RUSSIA_EPOS

activities.name: SW-Server
activities.description: Switch the Source Linked service based on server name

activities.name: CP-O9_STRGV2ToLand
activities.description: copy the files from O9 external storage to khc storage at land directory

activities.name: SV-goAhead_O9_STRGV2
activities.description: Set the go-ahead variable for 09 storage

activities.name: CP-RUSSIA_EPOSToLand
activities.description: Copy source files from Russia Epos to Land folder

activities.name: SP-CP-RUSSIA_EPOSToLand
activities.description: Stored Procedure which Audit the entry in generic_activity_error_audit_log table

activities.name: CP-UPCLEAR_ToLand
activities.description: Copy UpClear source data  to land blob storage

activities.name: CP-RUSSIA_TPOToLand
activities.description: Copy source file to Land Folder for Russia TPO

activities.name: SV-goAhead_RUSSIA_TPO
activities.description: Set goAhead Variable if copied files from source system

activities.name: SP-CP-RUSSIA_TPOToLand
activities.description: Audit log into error log activity table

activities.name: SW-goAhead
activities.description: Switch based on goAhead Variable value
